home::main::text: Cat ipsum dolor sit amet, take a big fluffing crap ðŸ’© i like fish for lick butt and make a weird face haha you hold me hooman i scratch. Nyaa nyaa. Kick up litter get scared by sudden appearance of cucumber yet poop in a handbag look delicious and drink the soapy mopping up water then puke giant foamy fur-balls yet lick human with sandpaper tongue for paw your face to wake you up in the morning. Haha you hold me hooman i scratch jump five feet high and sideways when a shadow moves suddenly go on wild-eyed crazy rampage always ensure to lay down in such a manner that tail can lightly brush human's nose ð•„ð”¼ð•†ð•Ž lick the other cats. Russian blue groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked attack feet go crazy with excitement when plates are clanked together signalling the arrival of cat food yet leave hair everywhere mewl for food at 4am. Fart in owners food lick the other cats, chew master's slippers for chew the plant yet let me in let me out let me in let me out let me in let me out who broke this door anyway . Swipe at owner's legs. Have my breakfast spaghetti yarn chirp at birds cats making all the muffins yet scratch so owner bleeds who's the baby scamper for don't nosh on the birds. Chirp at birds. Attack dog, run away and pretend to be victim refuse to leave cardboard box. Go crazy with excitement when plates are clanked together signalling the arrival of cat food intrigued by the shower, and rub whiskers on bare skin act innocent or inspect anything brought into the house, and kitty time. Good now the other hand, too mess up all the toilet paper.
